attributes.action: intervene to prevent Gary McKinnon being extradited to the USA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gary McKinnon is a naive individual who managed to get into 93 American Military computers looking for UFO information.
It would be more appropriate for him to be employed to test their security rather than being prosecuted with a potential sentence of 70 years.
Any action against him, if any at all, should be taken in the country where he performed his actions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
